languages.text: "Ваши попытки пошутить неуместны". {n}Абеляр хмурится.{/n} "Вы едва не сгубили нас всех..."
"Your attempts at humour are inappropriate." {n}Abelard frowns.{/n} "You nearly got us all killed..."
languages.original_text: "Ваши попытки пошутить неуместны". {n}Абеляр хмурится.{/n} "Вы едва не сгубили нас всех..."

traits.locale_text: "Your attempts at humour are inappropriate." {n}Abelard frowns.{/n} "You nearly well got us all killed by charging straight into the fire..."
"Your attempts at humour are inappropriate." {n}Abelard frowns.{/n} "You nearly well got us all killed by charging straight into the fire..."

"Your attempts at humour are inappropriate." {n}Abelard frowns.{/n} "You nearly got us all killed..."

languages.text: “这种时候表现幽默感恐怕并不合适。”{n}阿贝拉德皱起了眉头。{/n}“您刚刚差点把我们全都害死……”
languages.original_text: "Your attempts at humour are inappropriate." {n}Abelard frowns.{/n} "You nearly got us all killed..."

traits.locale_text: “这种时候表现幽默感恐怕并不合适。”{n}阿贝拉德皱起了眉头。{/n}“您刚刚直接冲进了火里，差点把我们全都害死……”

languages.text: «Sus gracietas son muy poco apropiadas». {n}Abelard frunce el ceño.{/n} «Casi consigue matarnos a todos...».
languages.original_text: "Your attempts at humour are inappropriate." {n}Abelard frowns.{/n} "You nearly got us all killed..."

traits.locale_text: «Sus gracietas son muy poco apropiadas». {n}Abelard frunce el ceño.{/n} «Casi consigue matarnos a todos arrojándose contra las llamas...».

languages.text: 「今の場合、ユーモアは不適切です」{n}アベラルドは眉をひそめる。{/n}「危うく我々全員が殺されるところでした…」
languages.original_text: "Your attempts at humour are inappropriate." {n}Abelard frowns.{/n} "You nearly got us all killed..."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたのユーモアは不適切です」 {n}アベラルドは眉をひそめる。{/n} 「火の中に真っ直ぐ突撃して、危うく我々全員を殺すところだった…」
「今の場合、ユーモアは不適切です」{n}アベラルドは眉をひそめる。{/n}「危うく我々全員が殺されるところでした…」

languages.original_text: "Your attempts at humour are inappropriate." {n}Abelard frowns.{/n} "You nearly got us all killed..."

languages.text: « Ce n'est vraiment pas le moment de plaisanter, {n}rétorque Abélard en fronçant les sourcils.{/n} Vous avez bien failli nous faire tuer... »
languages.original_text: "Your attempts at humour are inappropriate." {n}Abelard frowns.{/n} "You nearly got us all killed..."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est vraiment pas le moment de plaisanter, {n}rétorque Abélard en fronçant les sourcils.{/n} Vous avez bien failli nous faire tuer en fonçant droit dans les flammes... »

languages.text: "Euer Humor ist unangebracht." {n}Abelard verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Ihr hättet uns fast alle umgebracht ..."
languages.original_text: "Your attempts at humour are inappropriate." {n}Abelard frowns.{/n} "You nearly got us all killed..."

traits.locale_text: "Euer Humor ist unangebracht." {n}Abelard verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Ihr hättet uns fast alle umgebracht, indem Ihr direkt in das Feuer gestürmt seid ..."

languages.text: "Latife etme çabalarınız yakışık almıyor." {n}Abelard, kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Sizin yüzünüzden az daha canımızdan oluyorduk."
languages.original_text: "Your attempts at humour are inappropriate." {n}Abelard frowns.{/n} "You nearly got us all killed..."

traits.locale_text: "Latife etme çabalarınız yakışık almıyor." {n}Abelard, kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Sizin yüzünüzden az daha canımızdan oluyorduk."
